name: Littlest Pet Shop: City Friends
description:
The Littlest Pet Shop Friends games on the DS are the second installment of the Littlest Pet Shop games. Bear has just arrived in town with a special friend. It is your task to follow the pets around town and gather everything for the party. Follow the story of the Littlest Pet Shop gang as they prepare for the biggest party of the year.

As you help the pets prepare for the surprise party, you will explore the Littlest Pet Shop world. In this installment, go on quests, customize your pets with an assortment of accessories and play a variety of mini-games with them. Mini-games include shuffleboard, skee-ball, Plinko, baking treats and many more. Littlest Pet Shop: City Friends is one of three games simultaneously released featuring different pets.
